h1Banner: Meet Our Brands | Trusted Roofing Contractors
p2:
We're proud to partner with experienced roofing companies serving Humble, Kingwood, Atascocita, and nearby communities. Each local roofing partner specializes in residential and commercial roofing servicesâ€”from full roof replacement and storm-damage restoration to targeted repairs, roof inspections, and preventive maintenance. While every company operates independently, they share one mission: providing durable roofs, transparent pricing, and reliable service backed by workmanship warranties.

Browse below to discover trusted roofing experts in your area. Click through to view services, read customer reviews, or schedule a free roof inspection and estimate near you. Call Us At [phone].

brandslist.brandDescription: We're a locally owned roofing contractor specializing in asphalt shingle, metal, and flat roofing systems for homes and businesses throughout Humble and Kingwood. Known for clear estimates, code-compliant installations, and fast storm-response crews, they offer full roof replacements, leak repairs, gutter installation, and hail/storm-damage claims assistance. Their crews are licensed, insured, and back their work with a 5- to 10-year workmanship warranty depending on the job. Whether you need an emergency tarp and temporary repair or a complete re-roof with upgraded underlayment and ventilation, Humble Roofing Co. provides personalized recommendations to extend roof life and protect your property.
